blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: I feel like Connor Franta's new video should be a PSA to the phandom.
question: I feel like Connor Franta's new video should be a PSA to the phandom.
answer:
Woah, yeah you’re right.


“Everything you put out online might as well be a direct message to that person. Because they can see it. They do have access to it.” Is the part that really resonated with me. Because that’s so relevant to the Phandom specifically. Sure, if you’re a major celebrity with a million posts in your tumblr tag per hour, you probably can’t keep up with them all. You’re going to miss some things. But that’s not the case for Dan and Phil. They aren’t major celebrities. You can check the Phan tag on tumblr and catch up on every single post from the last two days, all in less than a half hour. It’s all right there and it’s super easy to see. Posts are hard to miss, because they aren’t immediately getting buried. So when you go posting smutty fanfiction or invasive theories, Dan and Phil will see it. And that’s not great.

reblog.comment:

tags: i guess since i'm already age verified i could just go on a very salty magic wand spree
summary: Fun with trying to buy the digital version of ii continues. This time I tried to do it through German amazon since that's the...
body: Fun with trying to buy the digital version of ii continues. This time I tried to do it through German amazon since that’s the one Polish customers are usually redirected to but alas after going through the whole process of verifying my age (a passport was involved) because - FUN FACT - ii is 18 rated in Germany (I think I’ve reached the point where this whole mess is starting to feel funny) I couldn’t finish the transaction because my card is not issued from a German bank. So we’re back to square one. I guess I’m gonna wait a little longer to see if it appears in Polish iTunes but I can’t say it’s not annoying that there’s no information if it’s even sth they’re working on. Another strange thing is that unlike uk and us amazon, the German one doesn’t sell the deleted scene - no idea why, all other bonuses were there. If everything else fails there’s always @dnplesbian ’s great gift card hack.

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: Body Worship Masterlist
body:
Aftermath (ao3) - thisisalterego

Summary: What happens after Crime and Punishment? Things progress a bit differently than the first installment.

All We Wanted - auroraphilealis

Summary: Brick by Brick Timestamp: It’s been five years since Dan and Phil properly settled down together, and now that Dan has a stable job, and they’ve bought themselves a home, they’re ready to start building a family together. Omegaverse, Breeding fic.

Benefits (ao3) - Misha_with_wings

Summary: They never talked about it.

“It” being those nights where one or both of them just needed a release and they helped each other out.

Maybe they both secretly wished they were more than friends, but friendship did have its benefits.

Brace Yourself, Bite Your Lips -  heureux-a-nouveau

Summary: Dan is having a party and Phil comes over to complain about the noise, but then Phil ends up staying. They both end up a lil tipsy and do some stuff.

Chasing Tomorrow - chocolatesaucelester

Summary: Something major was bound to change in their lives, it was just that neither Dan nor Phil could have guessed that it would be something so significant.

Closer (ao3) - legdabs (scvlly)

Summary: Dan posts an instagram story, and Phil gets a bit posessive.

Every Last Bit (ao3) - htmllost

Summary: Dan’s self conscious because he’s been gaining a bit of weight. Phil comforts him because his bear is beautiful no matter what.

Give Me More (ao3) - Misha_with_wings

Summary: Who knew a lazy morning full of fluff and cuddles could turn into edging and overstimulation so quickly.

Head To Toe (ao3) - crazed_peanut

Summary: Inspired by the following exchange in the DAPG video of FNAF2.

I knew your skin until I didn’t (ao3) - AgingPhangirl (Madophelia)

Summary: Everything is different and yet everything is the same.

Some freckle-worship because our boys are back from America and covered in them.

I’m Tired (ao3) - phandomghostwriter

Summary: A tired Phil misses Dan and just wants to feel close to him before he goes to bed.

Perfection - darling-phil

Summary: Dan wakes up feeling insecure but doesn’t want to bother Phil with his problems. Phil notices anyway and vows to show Dan just how perfect he is.

Sometimes Slow Is Good - thetummyhand

Summary: Very slightly tipsy gentle/slow smut in which they’re both very tired but still want to do it.

Thigh Kissing - botanistlester

Summary: Phil loves everything about Dan, but he loves kissing his thighs more than anything in the world.

Touch (ao3) - winstonlives

Summary: Dan is home alone, and decides to go au naturale. It would be all fine and dandy, but then he gets a little drunk. A couple pictures, a few texts, and a surprising phone call changes everything.

Weave Me into Your Skin - botanistlester

Summary: When Phil finds a pair of panties mixed in with his and Dan’s laundry, he’s not sure what to think, consider he’s certain neither of them has brought home a girl in the past few weeks. What’s even stranger is what he finds in Dan’s room when he goes to inquire about the offending garment.

We’re Young and In Love (Heart Attacks Waiting to Happen) (ao3) - orphan_account

Summary: Phil swaps places - or times, so to speak - and has a lot of fun.

You Weren’t Supposed To See That (ao3) - thiccennugget

Summary: Phil walks in on Dan touching himself and smut ensues–Obviously, because these horny children can’t keep their hands off each other once the tension breaks.

Summary: Something major was bound to change in their lives, it was just that neither Dan nor Phil could have guessed that it would be something so significant.

Closer (ao3) - legdabs (scvlly)

Summary: Dan posts an instagram story, and Phil gets a bit posessive.

Every Last Bit (ao3) - htmllost

Summary: Dan’s self conscious because he’s been gaining a bit of weight. Phil comforts him because his bear is beautiful no matter what.

Give Me More (ao3) - Misha_with_wings

Summary: Who knew a lazy morning full of fluff and cuddles could turn into edging and overstimulation so quickly.

Head To Toe (ao3) - crazed_peanut

Summary: Inspired by the following exchange in the DAPG video of FNAF2.

I knew your skin until I didn’t (ao3) - AgingPhangirl (Madophelia)

Summary: Everything is different and yet everything is the same.

Some freckle-worship because our boys are back from America and covered in them.

I’m Tired (ao3) - phandomghostwriter

Summary: A tired Phil misses Dan and just wants to feel close to him before he goes to bed.

Perfection - darling-phil

Summary: Dan wakes up feeling insecure but doesn’t want to bother Phil with his problems. Phil notices anyway and vows to show Dan just how perfect he is.

Sometimes Slow Is Good - thetummyhand

Summary: Very slightly tipsy gentle/slow smut in which they’re both very tired but still want to do it.

Thigh Kissing - botanistlester

Summary: Phil loves everything about Dan, but he loves kissing his thighs more than anything in the world.

Touch (ao3) - winstonlives

Summary: Dan is home alone, and decides to go au naturale. It would be all fine and dandy, but then he gets a little drunk. A couple pictures, a few texts, and a surprising phone call changes everything.

Weave Me into Your Skin - botanistlester

Summary: When Phil finds a pair of panties mixed in with his and Dan’s laundry, he’s not sure what to think, consider he’s certain neither of them has brought home a girl in the past few weeks. What’s even stranger is what he finds in Dan’s room when he goes to inquire about the offending garment.

We’re Young and In Love (Heart Attacks Waiting to Happen) (ao3) - orphan_account

Summary: Phil swaps places - or times, so to speak - and has a lot of fun.

You Weren’t Supposed To See That (ao3) - thiccennugget

Summary: Phil walks in on Dan touching himself and smut ensues–Obviously, because these horny children can’t keep their hands off each other once the tension breaks.

blog.name: ao3feedphan
blog.title: ao3feed-phan
blog.description: RSS feed of Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on ao3

title: mortal perfection
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2r6y5T3

by notanannoyingfangirl

“Louise,” Dan hissed, “have you taken me to a medieval torture chamber?!”

There was nothing fake about it.

Because the room was, indeed, filled with a dozen or so devices that definitely looked like they could have belonged in Henry VIII’s creepy basement.

Louise burst into laughter. “Oh, Dan,” she cooed, “you should see your face.”

Dan scowled at her. “I’m serious, Lou, what the hell is this?” He asked, gesturing to the machinery.

“It’s called a reformer,” a voice that Dan didn’t recognize said.

// Dan isn’t sure what to expect what Louise drags him to a Pilates exercise class. It isn’t Phil Lester.
